com.lukas783.mdt.api

Class PomInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.lukas783.mdt.api.PomInfo

  • public class PomInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    A POJO that defines an XML POM file. An XML POM file is used by Maven to declare how to build a project into an artifact. The purpose of this object is to map the node values and attributes of an XML POM file into an easy-to-access map to retrieve particular values and attributes from a given XML POM file.
    Author:
    Lucas Carpenter

    • Constructor Detail

      • PomInfo

        public PomInfo(java.io.File pomFile)
        Constructs a PomInfo object. Reads a file and attempts to map the values and attributes of the nodes in the file to an internal mapping to be better accessed elsewhere.
        Parameters:
        pomFile - The file to attempt to parse, should be in an XML format.

    • Method Detail

      • parseChildren

        private void parseChildren(java.lang.String currentPath,
                           org.w3c.dom.NodeList node)
        Recursively parses the nodes of an XML file into a mapping of attributes and values. The values parsed only parse if the node is reading the #text portion of the node. Otherwise, it attempts to parse the attributes available, if none are available, we retrieve a list of that node's children.
        Parameters:
        currentPath - The current path to the node value stored currently.
        node - The NodeList item currently being processed.

      • getNodeValue

        public java.lang.String getNodeValue(java.lang.String mapId)
        Retrieves the #text value of a given node.
        Parameters:
        mapId - The node ID string to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The value of the node's #text field, as a String.

      • getAttributeValue

        public java.lang.String getAttributeValue(java.lang.String nodeString,
                                          java.lang.String attributeString)
        Retrieves the particular attribute of a node given the node string ID and the attribute to look for.
        Parameters:
        nodeString - The node ID string.
        attributeString - The attribute ID string.
        Returns:
        The value of the node's attribute, as a String.

      • getAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAttributes(java.lang.String nodeString)
        Retrieves the particular mapping of attributes for a given node string ID.
        Parameters:
        nodeString - The node ID string.
        Returns:
        The mapping of attribute ID strings to attribute value strings.
